title: US-China trade talks in Malaysia, Trump to meet Xi in South Korea: Tariff truce to be extended? Here's what's expected
description:
Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng is all set to hold economic and trade talks with the US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Trade Representative Jamieson Greer on Thursday (local time), Xinhua reported, citing China's Ministry of Commerce.

Lifeng will lead a delegation to Malaysia from October 24 t...
